title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: East Fuji Maneuver Area, Japan
content:
Photo submitted by Masanori Iwamoto, “This is from Mt. Fuji Japan self defence army practice area. Pre-registration required and only opened specific days. 6 of my friends met up and ride together. My bike is 2020 Trek domane SL5, got it two months ago as 2nd hand, put gravel handle and conti terra speed 40c tubeless,

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: East Fuji Maneuver Area, Japan appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
